author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Removed orphan entry for ezcDebugMessage from autoload file.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Set minimal PHP dep to 5.2.1.
- For the bundle, make sure we depend on an *exact* version of each components,
to prevent the issue in
http://article.gmane.org/gmane.comp.web.ezcomponents.devel/3862

author: jpic:ez.no
msg: - Added an example of ezcMvcResult

author: jpic:ez.no
msg: - Clarified ezcMvcResponse property dockblocs
- Clarified ezcMvcRequestAuthentication password property docblock
- Clarified ezcMvcRequestAccept constructor and class level docblock
- Fixed typo in ezcMvcRequest $date property docblock
- In ezcMvcMailRawRequest, s/MvcToolsMailTiein/MvcMailTiein/
- Filled ezcMvcRequest property $requestId in the http request example

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Renamed createViewHandler to createView.
- Removed all parameters to all method calls from the dispatcher, except for
the ones to the configuration object to create routers, views or response
writers.
- Added proper constructors to the router, controller and response writer
interfaces.
- Updated the view abstract class to include a constructor, and updated the
methods to use the result object through a class property instead of as
parameter to the method.
- Removed parameters from the controller methods to run filters.
- Added the runResponseFilters() method to the response-writer interface.
- Reordered the document to follow the request flow.
